hudson.tasks.Shell.command: BUILD_ID=DONTKILLME source /etc/profile rm -rf pms git clone -b dev $para2 pms/ export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 cd pms/ mvn clean package -Pwebapi echo 'echo "$para1"' > apppasswd.sh chmod -R 777 * setsid env SSH_ASKPASS='./apppasswd.sh' DISPLAY='none:0' ssh SWARM@172.16.240.110 "mkdir -p /51F8593D-1516-4306-9AAC-2BF825A9B507" setsid env SSH_ASKPASS='./apppasswd.sh' DISPLAY='none:0' scp -r ibizpms-provider-webapi.jar SWARM@172.16.240.110:/51F8593D-1516-4306-9AAC-2BF825A9B507 setsid env SSH_ASKPASS='./apppasswd.sh' DISPLAY='none:0' ssh SWARM@172.16.240.110 "ps -ef | grep '/51F8593D-1516-4306-9AAC-2BF825A9B507'| tr -s ' '|cut -d' ' -f2,8,9 | grep -v grep | grep 'jar' | cut -d' ' -f1|xargs --no-run-if-empty kill -9" setsid env SSH_ASKPASS='./apppasswd.sh' DISPLAY='none:0' ssh SWARM@172.16.240.110 "source /etc/profile;source ~/.bash_profile; nohup java -jar -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=128M -XX:MaxPermSize=128m /51F8593D-1516-4306-9AAC-2BF825A9B507/ibizpms-provider-webapi.jar >>/51F8593D-1516-4306-9AAC-2BF825A9B507/pms_apiwebapi-`date --date='0 days ago' +%Y-%m-%d`.log 2>&1 &"
